description: Sequential number used to order entries in the guide; not a business key.
User account associated with the entry, likely the author or owner; confirm with SME.
Intended audience for the entry (users, roles, or groups) who can view it; format likely IDs or names; confirm with SME.
Main content of the guide entry, such as instructions, procedures, or notes specific to fleet operations.
Identifier of the user who created the entry.
Timestamp when the entry was created, in system time.
Identifier of the user who last modified the entry.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the entry.
